name: a Fairy special night - part 1
description:
Another night wasted, a fairy-tale romance making a mockery of a dreary day-to-day existence, and a.. a Fairy godfather?? Sometimes, a "click" is all that's needed

"a Fairy special night part 1" is a queer visual novel about a gay film school drop-out who finally takes a tentative step out of his social seclusion and into the daunting world of dating - helped by his very own fairy godfather and a dubious "wish-granting" website, where - apparently -

"satisfaction is guaranteed"..?

This release contains the first part of a planned, short, 3-act visual novel, originally created for Yaoi Game Jam 2017.
Part 1 currently includes 2 out of 3 paths and the first act of the story.

I hope to release the full game over the next couple of months, either incrementally in parts or as the full game when the whole thing is completed.

Content warning: "a Fairy special night" is written for a mature audience and contains objectionable language. The full release will include a (skippable) sex scene.

Currently features:
  • 4900 words
  • 2 distinct paths
Full game will contain:
  • 1.5-2 hours gameplay
  • 3 distinct paths of varying "adult" nature
  • 4-5 endings
  • R-rated scene - with option to opt out
Upcoming improvements (hopefully):
  • improved GUI
  • more choices during the survey
  • another path for the intro/chat sequence
  • part 2
Writing and programming: PMscenarios Sprites, backgrounds and CG: KP3228
